name: Blue Sun (Dominik Lussier-Marcotte)
description:
After waking up, M6 (Player) and C.A.D (Dear companion) must traverse their crashing ship wiping out different types of enemies and combining forces to survive this fast paced space first person shooter.

Recommended resolution: 1080 x 1920

Controls

  • WASD - Move/Dash
  • Mouse - Camera control + Aiming
  • E - Deploy shield
  • Right-Click - Activate synergy mode while holding
  • Left-Click - Fire
  • Ctrl - Crouch

Credits

Dominik Lussier-Marcotte - Level Design, Digital Art, Modeling, UI
Viktor Briceno - Game Design, Level Design, Programming
Luis Boscan - Programming
Camilo Arturo Castro Rizo - Character Modeling, AI Programming
Adam Sadek - Environment Modeling

Blue Sun is a prototype game that was made for a Dawson College class.
